column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Part 2a - You don't do an $80 steak often so when you do there is no margin for error. And the BOH of Bavette's just nailed it! Medium-Rare (+) - yes
column2: they accommodated and that little nuance of temperature did everything it could to bring this steak to one of
column3: if not the best i've ever had.  Details aside
column4: it was an experience like no other.  And if you even try to mess with the simple seasoning treatment they afford this steak
column5: you're doing yourself a disservice.  Leave it as is and let this month long + dry aged steak shine!
